name: Whyzz
overview:
When looking for answers to their kidsâ€™ questions on the Internet, many parents are often faced with hundreds of results that have the answer, but few that give the answer in a language your kids would understand.

whyzz is a rapidly growing database where parents can find kid-ready answers to how the world works, whenever and wherever a question is asked. Why is soap so slippery? Can stars fall off the sky? Why are hippos so mean? â€“ From science to animals to stinky, yucky, icky things, whyzz â€œtranslatesâ€ the facts into terms for young kids. Additionally, whyzz aims to assist parents in talking with their kids about serious issues such as violence, war, and death, and in answering their tough questions on these subjects. whyzz.com can be accessed from home computers or mobile devices.

Answers and articles on whyzz are contributed by Staff Writers as well as professionals such as psychologists and respected organizations. But since parents often know best, whyzz aims to become the definitive what-why-how resource using articles contributed and rated by our users. Log on today and join in the fun! â€“ As an added bonus, whyzz donates $2 to READ Charity for every article we publish that our users have submitted.
